name: In re ADOPTION of J. C. M. Appeal of F. M.
name_abbreviation: In re Adoption of J. C. M.

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: In re ADOPTION of J. C. M. Appeal of F. M.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Laurence T. Himes, Jr., York, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
415 A.2d 412
In re ADOPTION of J. C. M. Appeal of F. M.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 22, 1980.
Decided June 18, 1980.
Laurence T. Himes, Jr., York, for appellant.
Daniel Shoemaker, York, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
